backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing memories with auto-incremented IDs, providing submit, get, and list endpoints with basic validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Tingi-related features to their impacted files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app flow controlling password gate, welcome screen, memory submission/list views, and Tingi widget visibility.
frontend/src/components/MemoryList.tsx: Lists memory cards with text, author, timestamps, images, and video viewer support with error handling.
frontend/src/components/MemorySubmitForm: Form component for submitting memories with text, author, image/video URLs or uploads, including validation and preview handling.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Four‑digit password gate UI that validates input and triggers unlock logic with error handling.
frontend/src/components/TingiWidget.tsx: Floating search assistant widget that configures API keys, handles Google search requests, and displays humorous chat responses.
frontend/src/components/VideoViewer.tsx: Modal video viewer that plays a video URL and shows an error alert if playback fails.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero image and intro text, offering buttons to enter the memory book or lock it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemories.ts: Hooks for fetching sorted memories and submitting new ones through the backend actor, with React Query integration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordGate.ts: Implements a session‑stored 4‑digit password gate with unlock and lock helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook kept for future query-related code.
frontend/src/hooks/useTingiConfig.ts: Manages loading and saving Google Custom Search API config in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWelcomeGate.ts: Tracks whether the welcome screen has been dismissed using session storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm theme using OKLCH CSS variables with light/dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable date strings.
frontend/src/lib/googleCustomSearch.ts: Calls Google Custom Search API with validation and maps responses to simple result objects.
frontend/src/lib/tingiHumor.ts: Generates playful greetings, summaries, and error messages for Tingi using search results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme variables.
project_state.json: Describes overall project state, features, and requirements for the Rapunzel memories site.
